:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
a. Hover over the risk area you want to add a guideline to.

a. When the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** menu appears, click on it and select **{{< fa plus >}} Add Guideline**.

a. Provide a **[title]{.smallcaps}** and **[description]{.smallcaps}** for your guideline.

a. Click **Add Guideline** to insert your guideline to that risk area.

    After you save, confirm that your guideline was added to your risk area in alphabetical order.
::::
